name: Survivor

visualDescription.body: Thin and weakened from extended hospitalization
visualDescription.visibleClothing: Hospital gown, in need of proper clothing
visualDescription.condition: Recently awakened from a coma, disoriented but mobile

backstory: You were admitted to St. Joseph Medical Center with severe injuries prior to the outbreak. You've been in a coma for months, and have awakened to find the hospital abandoned, with signs of chaos everywhere. Your memory is foggy about the events leading up to your hospitalization, but you know you need to survive in this changed world.

inventory.name: Hospital Bracelet
inventory.description: A plastic ID bracelet with your patient information on it

rpgTags.name: Medical: Basic
rpgTags.description: You have a basic understanding of first aid

rpgTags.name: Observant
rpgTags.description: Your senses are sharp, helpful for spotting danger or resources
